the mixing device being provided with a grip to be held by one hand, the other hand being used for driving the mixing device
with two or more mixing tools
with coaxial tools
the rotating tools being driven by a reciprocating member, e.g. by a rack-and-pinion mechanism or by a tangentially-pulled rope
the tools rotating about a horizontal or inclined axis
the mixing devices being provided with an additional liquid receptacle, e.g. for adding oil during mixing
Construction of the rotating mixing tools

with rectilinearly reciprocating tools
Whisks or similar tools comprising mixing wires
the wires being of the closed-loop type mounted at the end of a shaft
